mainFeaturedPost.title: New Godzilla Movie Footage Shows Kaiju Growing Spikes & Weaponizing His Tail
mainFeaturedPost.description: New footage from Godzilla Minus One shows the titular kaiju growing spikes and weaponizing his tail, teasing his vast amount of destruction.

featuredPosts.title: ‘Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse’ Sets Netflix Streaming Debut
featuredPosts.description: Months after dominating at the box office, the superhero sequel will premiere Oct. 31 on the streaming service only in the U.S

featuredPosts.title: Hayao Miyazaki’s ‘The Boy and the Heron’ English Voice Cast Includes Christian Bale
featuredPosts.description: Through encounters with his friends and uncle, follows a teenage boy psychological development. He enters a magical world.
